markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tiger](/Monsters.aspx?ID=69)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Tigers are solitary and territorial hunters, using their striped hides to blend into the forests and jungles they call home and preferring to attack with surprise.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Tiger](/Monsters.aspx?ID=69)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 53</row>

**Perception** +12; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +13,
**Damage** 1d10+7 piercing plus Grab

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 slashing

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The tiger Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the tiger began this action hidden, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The tiger deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

**Wrestle** <actions string="Single Action" />  The tiger makes a claw Strike against a creature it is grabbing. If the attack hits, that creature is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-19" />
name: Tiger

If the tiger began this action hidden, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike. Sneak Attack The tiger deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
